channel.title: Client run. bat help please
channel.description: hey i'm trying to run the client for torvapkz v1 but it does work , only the source works this is what i have @echo off Title Client cd ./Class/ "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_05\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause when i run it it says error: could not find or load main class server. Server

item.title: Client run. bat help please
item.dc:creator: @nervo nervo
item.description:
@nervo wrote:

hey i’m trying to run the client for torvapkz v1 but it does work , only the source works this is what i have
@echo off
Title Client
cd ./Class/
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_05\bin\java.exe” -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause
when i run it it says error: could not find or load main class server. Server

Read full topic
